backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, access control, and deposit intent/submission storage with authorization checks and utility helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend routing fixes and global error fallback additions with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, layouts, session handling, and UI screens.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global design tokens, theming variables, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document providing the root container and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and layouts with ThemeProvider, Outlet rendering, and error boundary wrapping.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a simple fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/layouts/AdminDas: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar, header, and routed content area using Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layouts/PublicLa: Public site layout with header, footer, and routed content rendered via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layouts/UserDash: User dashboard layout with sidebar, header, and main routed content area using Outlet.
frontend/src/components/nav/AdminSidebar: Admin sidebar navigation listing dashboard, deposits, users, announcements, and settings links.
frontend/src/components/nav/DashboardHea: Dashboard header with sidebar trigger and logout logic that clears session and redirects to login.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicFooter: Renders the public footer with branding, current year, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicHeader: Displays the public navigation header with links, logo, and a mobile-responsive menu.
Provides the authenticated user sidebar with grouped navigation links for dashboard, tokens, and referrals.
frontend/src/components/screens/AccessDe: Shows an access denied message with options to go to login or return home.
frontend/src/components/screens/AppError: Displays a generic error screen with a reload button for unrecoverable app errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, presale data, deposits, and user lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Combines identity, actor, and user queries to expose authentication state, profile, and role info.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and VCoin theme colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHome.tsx: Displays admin dashboard metrics using user data and placeholder values for presale stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettings.t: Provides UI sections for modifying presale settings, wallet address, and vesting, with features not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Announcements.t: Shows a management page for admin announcements with a placeholder for active items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DepositsQueue.t: Renders an admin view for reviewing pending deposits, currently showing an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UsersManagement: Fetches and displays all registered users in a table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Login.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and redirects users or admins to their respective dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Register.tsx: Manages registration flow using Internet Identity and submits a new user profile after login.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, features overview, and links to registration and whitepaper.
frontend/src/pages/public/Roadmap.tsx: Static roadmap page outlining VCoin development milestones from 2025 to 2030.
frontend/src/pages/public/SmartContractA: Displays planned smart contract components for VCoin and explains current off-chain presale management.
frontend/src/pages/public/Whitepaper.tsx: Renders the VCoin whitepaper with project intro, vision, tokenomics, referral model, and vesting details.
frontend/src/pages/user/BuyVCoin.tsx: Provides UI for calculating VCN purchases, copying wallet address, and creating presale deposit intents.
frontend/src/pages/user/DepositHistory.t: Shows the user's deposit submissions with status, parsed from stored JSON entries.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralEarnings: Displays referral code, sharing tools, reward structure, and current referral earnings.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralNetworkT: Shows a placeholder network tree view with referral instructions when no referrals exist.
frontend/src/pages/user/TokenBalance.tsx: Displays total, locked, and unlocked VCN balances with a notice about vesting until 2027.
frontend/src/pages/user/UserHome.tsx: User dashboard showing welcome text, quick links for buying tokens, viewing balances, referrals, and a referral code copy feature.
Displays vesting status, showing a pre-launch notice or active vesting details based on the current year.
frontend/src/routes/routeGuards.tsx: Provides UserGuard and AdminGuard components that enforce authentication, admin role checks, and optional forced admin password change.
frontend/src/utils/fingerprint.ts: Generates and stores a persistent browser fingerprint using basic environment properties.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallbacks and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for app-wide styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing VCoin’s Web2 presale system, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
